name: Greenhouse Communications
goal: The consultancy provides counsel & advice on global agri-food regulatory and policy issues to clients in the U.S. and EU agri-food sectors.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Research and Technology, Trade
customers: US Soybean Export Council,American Soybean Association,International Soy Growers Alliance
